choice: Choose one of the following sandwiches:

items.title: CHICKEN PHILLY
items.description: Seared chicken breast, roasted garlic aioli, bell pepper, onion, mushroom, hoagie roll

items.title: HAM 'N' MORE
items.description: Roasted ham, smoked gouda, poppyseed mustard, shaved pear, potato roll

items.title: CUBANO
items.description: Roasted pork tenderloin, honey ham, Genoa salami, swiss, sweet pickle, pork-infused mayo, yellow mustard, cubano roll

items.title: FLYING V
items.description: Hummus, red pepper, pickled red onion, quick-pickled cucumber, shaved apple, dill, everything bagel (V)

items.title: CHOOSE TWO SIDES
description: Kettle cooked chips w/ house ranch
Red leaf salad w/ macerated peach, walnut, shaved parmesan, sherry dressing
